original_text: Those were all the sons of David's wives. Tamar was their sister. He also had slave wives who gave birth to sons for him.
korean_text: 다 다윗의 아들이요 그들의 누이는 다말이며 이 외에 또 소실의 아들이 있었더라

sentences.original_text: Those were all the sons of David's wives.
who gave birth to sons for him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 아내들은 그를 위해 아들을 낳아주었습니다.
